message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I think this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to walk away if this is not acceptable to you.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1350000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to go up to $1200000, which is my absolute maximum. I hope we can come to an agreement.
